comment.author: 13724845@N07
comment._content: It looks like the description of this photo was entered incorrectly, the Sandusky Ohio Ore Docks loaded  freighters (and continues to today) not unload them.  Call number LC-USW36-661 clearly shows the process.

comment.author: 27056077@N00
comment._content:
We used to have two coal dumpers in South Amboy. I wish I could see these things in operation. 

Thanks for sharing.

comment.author: 84624968@N06
comment._content: For what it's worth, the two coal loaders in the foreground have been taken down; the one in the middle, in the far background, is the "New" one (built in 1930s) and is still operating.
